description_text:
Good evening, I'm writing to try to get some help with my plus x pedals and
vram ffb motors.
I ordered them a month ago, I received the pedals first then the motors. I
attached the motors as directed and after a few days one of the motors
stopped working. I sent it back and received a replacement. They worked
fine for a couple minutes then the same motor on started to get weak and
then eventually stopped. I moved the plug to the left side which is
number 3 and the motors work. Is there something I need to do to the
control box because now i see its the box and not the motor? Please help/ I
purchased from amazon

Respectfully and Sincerely Submitted

Derrick Antonio Williams
DaneTheGamer- Sim Racing Enthusiast
Audio Engineer, Beat Programmer & Song Writer @ D.A.W MUSIC
914-419-8096
